definition: lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc
to feel/to move/to touch/to affect/feeling/emotion/(suffix) sense of ~
to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with

sentences.english: He can communicate with her by telepathy.
sentences.chinese: 他能用心电感应与她沟通。

sentences.english: This is probably the twin heart inductance between the sisters ought.
sentences.chinese: 这或许就是孪生姐妹间的心电感应。

sentences.english: Parapsychological activities, such as telepathy and mind reading.
sentences.chinese: 心灵学行为，如心电感应和测心术。

sentences.english: Qiu yun also extended his hand as if telepathy, resolutely sank to the sea.
sentences.chinese: 秋娟仿佛心电感应般也伸出手，毅然沉入大海。

definition: hearts linked as one, just as the proverbial rhinoceros communicates emotion telepathically through his single horn (idiom); fig. two hearts beat as one
pinyin: xin1 you3 ling2 xi1 yi1 dian3 tong1

definition: sixth sense (i.e. intuition, premonition, telepathy etc)
to communicate with the spirits/psychic/(ears) sensitive/(information) accurate
like polarities repel each other/(fig.) like repels like
